availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Julian Calhoon (Calloway County, KY, residentand prov govt )

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, resident. Williamson County, Tennessee, native. Son of John Calhoon and Bitha Wells Calhoon. Married Elizabeth Sanders Calhoon in Calloway County on October 12, 1856. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Calloway County, Liberty Precinct, p. 55B.
